glsa.title: Streamripper: Buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been discovered in Streamripper, allowing for user-assisted execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Streamripper is a tool for extracting and recording mp3 files from a Shoutcast stream.

description.p: Chris Rohlf discovered several boundary errors in the httplib_parse_sc_header() function when processing HTTP headers.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to connect to a malicious streaming server, resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running Streamripper.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
